Description:
As you venture forward, a scorching trail sears its mark upon the grass, leaving a path of charred vegetation in its wake. Your attention is drawn to a pair of piercing yellow eyes that meet yours, and in that instant, the enigmatic nature of the Dragonborn becomes clear. 
The Dragonborn, embodying the essence of their draconic lineage, come in a kaleidoscope of colors that mirror their affinity to elemental forces. From the fiery red scales symbolizing a connection to flames, to the electric hues representing a mastery over lightning, each Dragonborn bears a unique chromatic expression of their power. Some may display majestic wings, capable of carrying them through the skies with grace, while others brandish horns and tails that serve as physical manifestations of their draconic heritage.
Speaking a language known as Draconic, a complex tongue of breaths and resonating shouts, the Dragonborn wield a formidable ability to harness the elemental forces within them. Through their breath, they can unleash torrents of flame, bolts of lightning, icy gusts, or other elemental manifestations, harnessing and mastering their power to devastating effect. Born from eggs rather than nurtured within mammals, the Dragonborn possess a profound connection to the cycles of life and rebirth, their hatching representing the emergence of ancient wisdom and raw potential.

Creation.Stat Restrictions: Your Intelligence and Might must be at least 1.

Language: You speak Common and a number of languages of choice equal to your Intelligence, out of which one must be Draconic, the ancient language of dragons that relies on conveying powerful messages through short words, shouts and dragon breath.
Other: Dragonborn have tails, though you can choose not to have one.

~Draconic Ancestry~.Effect:
When creating your character, choose any element from Acid, Cold, Fire, Shock, Force, Poison and Necrotic.
That becomes your Dragonborn Element.
~Draconic Ancestry~.Notes: The color of your skin and scales as a Dragonborn should reflect the element you chose (e.g. Cold might be associated with white or blue Dragonborns).

~Dragonborn Resistance~.Effect: You take only 50% Damage from your Dragonborn Element type.

~Dragon's Breath~.Effect:
Breathe your Dragonborn Element in an area determined on your chosen shape (see below).
Make an attack against all Units caught in your breath.
The attack deals 2d6 + 2 Damage of your Dragonborn Element.
~Dragon's Breath~.Upgrade: At Levels 3, 6 and 9, you get one extra use of Dragon's Breath per Adventure (e.g. the Cooldown becomes 2 times / Adventure, 3 times / Adventure, etc).
~Dragon's Breath~.Notes: If by any chance your Dragon's Breath has no shape, it shoots in a 3x1 meter line from your position.

Starting Abilities Description.Color and Element:
When you create your character, choose your Dragonborn's color/element combination.
Then, you will choose the shape you want to be able to breathe your element in.

Starting Abilities Description.Area Shapes:
If you are playing on a grid, check the Area Shapes section to see how the Cone will look.
Breath - Line can be centered with either the left or right or diagonal starting square directly in front of you (so it might be slightly to the left or slightly to the right).

~Breath - Area~.Effect: Your Dragon's Breath now breathes in a 3x3 meter area.

~Breath - Line~.Effect: Your Dragon's Breath now breathes in a 4x2 meter line.

~Breath - Blast~.Effect: Your Dragon's Breath now breathes on all Units within 2 meter of you.

Ability Choices Description: As a Dragonborn, you can choose how your Dragon's Breath has evolved.

~Second Skin~.Effect:
Choose one more color from Draconic Ancestry.
You also gain Dragonborn Resistance to that color's element.
You can freely change Dragon's Breath to that element.

~Forceful Breath~.Effect:
Your Dragon's Breath now deals 2d8 + 3 Damage.
Also, all Units affected by Dragon's Breath must make a Might Check or be pushed 4 meters away from you.

~Breath Control~.Effect: You can use Dragon's Breath one extra time per Adventure.

~Wingspan~.Effect: Quickly fly up to 5 meters (e.g. almost instantly).
~Wingspan~.Upgrades: At Levels 3, 6 and 9, you get one extra use of Wingspan per Adventure (e.g. the Cooldown becomes 2 times / Adventure, 3 times / Adventure, etc).
